mapper.select: SELECT A.MID AS MID, A.FINDPW AS FINDPW FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MID = #{mid} and A.MEMAILCHK = 'Y'

SELECT A.MNO AS MNO, A.MID AS MID, A.MPW AS MPW, A.MNAME AS MNAME, A.MTEL AS MTEL, A.MADDRNO AS MADDRNO, A.MADDR1 AS MADDR1, A.MADDR2 AS MADDR2, A.MAUTH AS MAUTH, A.MIMG AS MIMG, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.MPERMISSION AS MPERMISSION, A.MEMAILCHK AS MEMAILCHK, A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN, A.MINSERTDATE AS MINSERTDATE, A.MUPDATEDATE AS MUPDATEDATE, A.FINDPW AS FINDPW
FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.FINDPW = #{findpw}
